main event: A circular object was observed moving erratically, changing colors, with variable speed, at distances ranging from 5 miles to over 30 miles away.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 16 to 37 minutes., The object changed colors like a sparkling star., Previous sightings of the same object occurred over the past three weeks., The observation included both ground-radar and air-visual methods., The report concluded the sighting could have been caused by a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena.
witness description: Air traffic control specialists at Anchorage International Airport
